title: Compact font...
author: jan444

comments.content: This is Eurostile, though is seems to be a little more condensed than either of the versions I have. Perhaps it is [Eurostile Next Com Semibold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422055038/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile-next/) from Linotype?
